translations: [生物]样方（生态调查的方形地）；嵌块（填空的铅块）

sentences.sentence: Fig. 1 Location of the study area and quadrats setting.
sentences.translation: 图1研究区位置及样方布设。

sentences.sentence: Fig. 1 Layout of the transects, quadrats, species-area relations and point pattern observation positions within each monitoring plot.
sentences.translation: 图1单个监测样地上样线、样方、种-面积关系及点格局调查点的空间布局示意图。

sentences.sentence: Based on the survey from 32 belt-transects and 779 quadrats, it was found that slope, seed-tree, and shrub growth status are the main factors which affect natural regeneration on clear-cut sites.
sentences.translation: 通过对32个样带779个样方的调查，认为坡度、留母树否、灌木生长状况是影响皆伐后天然更新的主要因子。
